Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: cash provided by used in financing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: noncontrolling interests and other financing activities
payment for issuance of shares for employee benefit plans
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for noncontrolling interests and other financing activities
proceeds from payments to minority shareholders
sale leaseback transaction net proceeds financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Repayment of Debt: payments for deposits applied to debt retirements
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
increase decrease in client funds held investing activities
Purchases of Investments: net purchases of short term investment non fiduciary
payments for proceeds from marketable securities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in pension and postretirement obligations
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred income taxes and tax credits
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization and impairment of intangible assets
Net Cash from Operating Activities: cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: disposal group including discontinued operation gain loss from disposal
gain loss on sale of business
gain loss on saleof business and investments net

__unmapped__: income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
increase decrease in client funds held
increase in fiduciary liabilities net of fiduciary receivables
